data['zscore2']= ((data['alcohol'] - data['alcohol'].mean())/data['alcohol'].std())
filt = np.abs(data['zscore2'])<3
data = data[filt]
data['zscore3']=((data['total sulfur dioxide']-data['total sulfur dioxide'].mean())/data['total sulfur dioxide'].std())
